::Orchestra/Composer::

Orchestra's memory circuit tweaked a little, and he=
 now noticed how stupid he sounded by forgetting that they already had an a=
lliance with the Alliance.

"Anyway, I need to know if the Alliance is will=
ing to confirm staying at peace, err, just a minute," Orchestra said, then =
noticed a spot on his armor.

Orchestra got out a little rag and polished i=
t.  Just then Composer stepped in, holding his weapon just in case.  Orches=
tra had finished polishing, then looked up.  He froze.  Composer froze.  Or=
chestra dropped the rag without thinking.  Composer dropped his gun without=
 thinking.  They stared at each other for a few moments.  Orchestra stood u=
p, then stepped forward.  Composer stepped forward.  They walked up to each=
 other, then stood toe to toe.  They gazed into each other's optics.

"Oh m=
y god," both of them each whispered at the same time...



~Abyssian By Bir=
th~
~Badass By Choice~
